body_html: @ezyang since this pulls in JIT stuff, this op is only usable from libtorch, but not from libcaffe2. That means that if you want to call into this from Python you'll likely need to both import torch and import caffe2 in the same process. It seems brittle so I'm leaving it alone
body_text: @ezyang since this pulls in JIT stuff, this op is only usable from libtorch, but not from libcaffe2. That means that if you want to call into this from Python you'll likely need to both import torch and import caffe2 in the same process. It seems brittle so I'm leaving it alone
body: @ezyang since this pulls in JIT stuff, this op is only usable from libtorch, but not from libcaffe2. That means that if you want to call into this from Python you'll likely need to both `import torch` and `import caffe2` in the same process. It seems brittle so I'm leaving it alone
